topPRs.title: fix(txmgr): prevent resource leak from unstopped tickers in sendTx
topPRs.author: maradini77
topPRs.body:
The `sendTx` method in `SimpleTxManager` was creating new `time.Ticker` instances on each loop iteration without properly stopping previous ones. This caused a resource leak where:
- Background goroutines from tickers accumulated over time
- Timer resources were never released
- Under high transaction volume, this could lead to memory exhaustion and degraded performance

topContributors.summary: jsvisa: Focused on documentation improvements, opening a PR in ethereum-optimism/docs (#1885) to fix clarity issues, reflecting their primary focus on docs work.
maradini77: Focused on preventing resource leaks, opening a pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18358) to address this in the transaction manager.

freecodecrafter324y: Focused on documentation improvements, opening one pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18357) to update a README.md file, which involved modifying 28 lines and deleting 24 lines.
